message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS 

This paper deals with natural language processing and machine learning techniques for aspect detection in user-generated reviews. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves techniques for weakly supervised learning, which falls under the category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval). The use of neural networks and pre-trained word embeddings suggests the category of cs.LG (Learning). The paper also involves iterative co-training, which is a technique used in semi-supervised learning, which falls under the category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper involves techniques for handling noisy data, which falls under the category of cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
